channel.title: Cve on less on sec
channel.description: Recent content in Cve on less on sec

item.title: CVE-2025-65396: SPI Fault Enables Bootloader Access and Firmware Dump in Blurams Flare Camera
item.description: A vulnerability in the boot process of Blurams Flare Camera version 24.1114.151.929 and earlier allows a physically proximate attacker to hijack the boot mechanism and gain a bootloader shell via the UART interface.

item.title: CVE-2025-65397: Insecure Startup Script Allows Root Command Execution in Blurams Flare Camera
item.description: An insecure authentication mechanism in the safe_exec.sh startup script of Blurams Flare Camera version 24.1114.151.929 and earlier allows an attacker with physical access to the device to execute arbitrary commands with root privileges, if file /opt/images/public_key.

item.title: CVE-2024-29019: Authentication Bypass via Cross Site Request Forgery in ESPhome
CVE-2024-27081: Remote Code Execution via Arbitrary File Write in ESPHome
CVE-2023-27216: OS Command Injection Culnerability in D-Link DSL-3782
item.description: An issue found in D-Link DSL-3782 v.1.03 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code as root via OS command injection in multiple setting pages. Settings known to be affected by this issues are:

item.title: CVE-2022-44900: Path Traversal Vulnerability in py7zr
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in SevenZipFile.extractall() function of the python library py7zr version 0.20.0 and earlier allow attackers to read and write arbitrary files on the local machine via malicious 7z file extraction.
